init.title: Wear OS
init.description:
You can change the hostname of the device to another one, this is useful if you have several ais-dom devices on the network.

 The host name can not have any special characters [Details in the documentation ](https://www.ai-speaker.com).

confirm.description:
![AIS logo](/static/icons/change_host_name.png)

Do you want to add access to AIS from the app on your watch?
confirm.title: Wear OS

abort.do_the_restart: OK. Now you have to restart the device before the changes are visible on the network.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single overwrite of AIS host is allowed.
